Description.Name: SRM Ammo (Containment)
Description.Details: This multirole ammo bin will be loaded with Streak SRM or Standard SRM as required by your mech design. It is additionally protected from explosion by internal case. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. Containment SRM Ammo Bins are reinforced to contain half of the destructive force when an ammunition explosion occurs, but contain only 75 rounds of ammunition per ton. Explosion damage per ammo: 0.19
